meanings.sent1: The slime was the globbiest I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: Her hands were covered in the globbiest mud after playing in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The globbiest jelly wobbled on the plate, making everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: The toddler's attempt at making a sandcastle resulted in the globbiest structure imaginable.
meanings.sent5: The globbiest glue held the pieces together firmly.

meanings.sent1: The soup was the globbiest dish on the menu.
meanings.sent2: The slime had the globbiest texture, making it hard to clean up.
meanings.sent3: The globbiest paint dripped slowly down the canvas, creating a unique pattern.
meanings.sent4: The globbiest mud clung to their shoes, leaving a trail behind them.
meanings.sent5: The globbiest slime oozed out of the container, mesmerizing the children.
